Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.view_model

Class ViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.view_model.ViewController
public class ViewController extends Object
Controller class responsible for managing the client-side view interactions and synchronization with the server.

  • Field Details

    • lock

      public final Object lock
      Attribute used for synchronize actions between server and client

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewController

      public ViewController(MainClient mainClient)
      Constructs a ViewController object initialized with a main client instance. Initializes the simplified model, view request queue, synchronization object, and starts the executor.
      Parameters:
      mainClient - The main client object managing the connection and communication with the server.
